item.title: Keyboard macros in GNU Ranger
item.description: Ranger does not have a build-in keyboard macro mechanism, but you can use tmux for this. Create the tm-send-slow command 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 #!/bin/bash export TTY string="$1" grep -o . <<< "$string" | while IFS=$'\n' read -r char; do tmux send -l "$char" done Create the mapping 1 map F. shell -f tm-send-slow FFf Demonstration
